```{r, include=FALSE}
Sys.setlocale("LC_CTYPE", "Chinese")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("../../R/functions.R")
project <- read_mdtable(mdfile = "../../static/database/project.md", skip = 0)
project$PI <- convert_id2link(staff_id = project$PI, language = "zh")
project <- project[, c( "Year", "Project_zh", "PI", "Funding_zh")]
DT::datatable(project, escape = FALSE, 
              colnames = c("年份", "项目名称", "负责人", "资助单位"), 
              options = list(lengthMenu = c(nrow(project), 5, 10)))
```
